reporter_caption.center: JAMES STEWART COMPANY, INC. v. STATE OF NEW YORK, 218 App. Div. 810 (1926)

caption.center: JAMES STEWART COMPANY, INCORPORATED, Respondent, v. STATE OF NEW YORK,
Appellant. (Claim No. 15294, Barge Canal Contract No. 39.)

court.center: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York, Fourth Department.

opinion.opinion_text: Judgment, so far as appealed from, and order affirmed, with costs, on the authority of Jackson v. State of New York (210 App. Div. 115; affd., 241 N.Y. 563). All concur.
